snippet: Why had my account been closed? And where was all my money?
abstract: Op-Ed article by Russian-American author Masha Gessen describes having her Citibank account closed by the bank over apparent concerns about her connections to Russia; contends that the policies of weeding out Russian-Americans who have money are discriminatory and not efficient, as Russians who launder money do not do it by transferring large amounts of money between personal accounts in plain view of all relevant authorities.
lead_paragraph: Why had my account been closed? And where was all my money?
